name: Kaminoishi
description:
Kaminoishi is our teams Epic Megajam 2022 project which we created in 7 days via a team of 5.

Gameplay Video:

  • Randolph Aarseth https://www.linkedin.com/in/mraarseth/

  • Miroslav Buljevic https://www.linkedin.com/in/miroslav-buljevic-31a666235/
  • Petar Trećakov https://www.linkedin.com/in/petar-tre%C4%87akov-840152230
  • Russell (J) Howell https://www.linkedin.com/in/jvae

Theme and Story:  In keeping with the "As Above So Below" theme we decided a Samurai action-adventure would be perfect. Players enter our world as a Ronin returning to their family. They do return only to see the village conquered by Tainted Warriors and fight to try and carry out the revenge of the slaughtered. However, our Ronin discovers death is truly not the end and that their actions above have consequences below.

Game Design: Due to the time constraints we decided to make our project primarily focused on combat. We utilized and combined a few different assets in order to implement our core gameplay. The biggest influences for our design was the limited time we had to implement deeper features. This resulted in us scrapping additional mechanics such as magical items, ranged weaponry, loot, stealth and a scoring system. We focused on our teams strengths which included Customized UI/Artwork/music for our games visual aesthetic and presentation. We spent a large portion of time on the creation of a unique map so that we can map out a sequences of events for tutorials, story, and gameplay purposes.

Gameplay ~ Limited time made us focus on the core elements for implementation including:  Sword Combat, assassinations, movement, Enemy AI/Responsiveness, and sequenced story telling.

Controls/Directions/Instructions

  • Movement ~ W, A, S, D
  • Attack ~ Left Mouse Button
  • Assassinate ~ E
  • Dodge ~ Directional Button + Cntrl
  • Draw Weapon ~ 1
